sentences.en: Adviser of professor of university economy institute, doctoral student drives south.
sentences.cn: 南开大学经济研究所教授 、 博士生导师.

sentences.en: Author, A . A . ( 1986 ). Dissertation title. Unpublished doctoral dissertation, University Name, Place.
sentences.cn: 作者 ( 年代 ). 论文名称. ○○大学○○研究所硕士或博士论文, 未出版, 大学地点.

sentences.en: Electronic and Information Engineering, Telecommunications Engineering, and 2 Post Doctoral mobile stations.
sentences.cn: 现设有电子信息工程和通信工程2个本科专业.

sentences.en: Front cover: crimson for master students , blackish green for doctoral students.
sentences.cn: 论文封面: 硕士班(红色)、博士班(墨绿色).

sentences.en: He has already tutored 15 post - graduate master students and 10 doctoral students.
sentences.cn: 先后培养硕士研究生15名,博士研究生10名.

sentences.en: He was involved in writing his doctoral dissertation.
sentences.cn: 他在聚精会神地写他的博士论文.

sentences.en: He wrote his doctoral thesis on electromagnetism.
sentences.cn: 他写有关电磁的博士论文.

sentences.en: His doctoral dissertation on differential equations connected itself with existence theorems.
sentences.cn: 他论述微分方程的博士论文涉及到存在理论.

sentences.en: How is doctoral student of capital medical university taught?
sentences.cn: 首都医科大学博士生教育怎么样?

sentences.en: Lam a doctoral degree from Harvard University Graduate School of Design.
sentences.cn: 林先生毕业于哈佛大学设计学院并取得博士学位.

sentences.en: Mr. Karras, a doctoral student in education at Ohio State.
sentences.cn: 在俄亥俄州立大学攻读教育学博士的卡拉斯先生.

sentences.en: Signed, Patrick Mahoney. Underneath his name he conferred upon himself four or five doctoral titles.
sentences.cn: 署名PatrickMahoney,后面自赠了四五个博士头衔.

sentences.en: Thanks to the teacher's advice, my doctoral paper passed smoothly.
sentences.cn: 得到尊师的点拨, 我的博士论文才得以顺利通过.

sentences.en: The same procedure is followed more intensively at the doctoral level.
sentences.cn: 修博士学位程序也是如此,不过更为深入.

sentences.en: This post - doctoral fellow is someone whom you all know well : Peiyuan Zhou.
sentences.cn: 这位博士后的名字是大家都很熟悉的 —— 周培源.

words.tran_cn: 修理；窜改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

trans.tran_en: done as part of work for the university degree of doctor
